author: catwith1hat
content: Does the Beacon API spec include any hanging HTTP requests? I haven't been able to spot anything, but e.g. a `GET eth/v1/validator/attestation_data?slot=${WANTED_SLOT}` could be made to wait until attestation_data is available for the wanted slot. I would think that this would make some sense, but I don't think that's how any part of the spec works, right?

author: 0xunclebill
content: no that type of functionality doesn’t exist in the beacon API

author: 0xunclebill
content: seems like you’re looking for a web hook like interaction. Maybe some script that polls the endpoint on an interval could provide similar results?

author: catwith1hat
content: Thanks for the confirmation. I do already poll the endpoint. Just feels a bit ugly.
